name: Siren Care, Inc.
description: Developer of a smart sock designed to continuously measure foot temperature, an early indicator of injury that may lead to ulcers. The company's smart socks continuously track foot temperature and send information to the doctor to help them track issues related to inflammation, enabling podiatrists to detect early signs of inflammation in patients at risk of developing diabetic foot ulcers.
one_liner: Developer of a smart sock designed to continuously measure foot temperature, an early indicator of injury that may lead to ulcers. The company's smart socks continuously track foot temperature and send information to the doctor to help them track issues related to inflammation, enabling podiatrists to detect early signs of inflammation in patients at risk of developing diabetic foot ulcers.
